body:
Hey!

I don't know the community on here very well so ask me anything (well, almost) and get to know me :)

It'll be awkward if nobody replies to this so please ask away :3
body_tagged:

title: AMA - _Jupiter

replies.body:
Hey Jupiter! Welcome to the forums! I hope to see you in-game sometime soon and maybe talk!

favorite food?
favorite color?
favorite movie?
favorite book?
favorite animal?
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Do you enjoy knife throwing? Favourite drink? Favourite fruit? Favourite Avicus map? How did you find Avicus?
replies.body_tagged: Do you enjoy knife throwing? Favourite drink? Favourite fruit? Favourite Avicus map? How did you find Avicus?

replies.body:
Hey o/

We've already talked in game :p

What's it like being back?
replies.body_tagged:
Hey o/

We've already talked in game :p

What's it like being back?

replies.body:
food - chocolate
colour - black (if you say that's a shade, then dark blue)
movie - I just saw star wars and LOVED it but I have a special place in my heart for anything with a strong female protagonist
book - I just finished Black Widow: Forever Red and it was great and broke my heart, but my all time favourite series is Throne of Glass!
animal - wolf

see you in game sometime! :)

:( it was sad

replies.body:
you've been on my profile lol
yeah, I love knife throwing. It's fun and also sounds cool :P
drink - peach smoothies ftw
fruit - dragonfruit
avicus map - ternio has always been my love
how did I find avicus - a friend told me I should join and wrote the IP on my hand.

Also, Zeus is cool!
